itinerary.title: Day 1
itinerary.description:
: Kathmandu ➝ Lumbini | Arrival & Evening Walk
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Morning flight/drive from Kathmandu to Bhairahawa. Transfer to hotel in Lumbini, welcome drink & check-in. After a short rest, evening walk around the Sacred Garden for a peaceful start. Dinner & overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Day 2
itinerary.description:
: Full-Day Lumbini Exploration | Sacred Sites & Monasteries
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            After breakfast, begin a guided tour of Maya Devi Temple, Ashoka Pillar, Sacred Pond, and Monastic Zone where monasteries built by Thailand, Myanmar, Japan, Germany, and others showcase unique Buddhist architecture. After lunch, visit the World Peace Pagoda and Lumbini Museum. Optional evening meditation session can be arranged. Dinner & overnight at hotel.

itinerary.title: Day 3
itinerary.description:
: Tilaurakot Excursion ➝ Kathmandu
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Morning visit to Tilaurakot, the ancient palace ruins where Prince Siddhartha spent his early life before enlightenment. Return for breakfast, check-out, and transfer to Bhairahawa for flight/drive back to Kathmandu with blessings of peace.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before departure
